bill.title: Absentee Polling Place; Voter Registration
bill.description: Provides a process for voter registration at absentee polling places. Effective 07/01/50. (SD2)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Passed First Reading
Referred to JUD, referral sheet 3
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Thursday, 02-21-13 2:00PM in House conference room 325.
The committee(s) on JUD recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 02-26-13 at 2:00pm.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 02-26-13 2:00PM in conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Rhoads, Har, Belatti, Brower, Cabanilla, Carroll, Kawakami, C. Lee, Tsuji, Wooley; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) McDermott, Thielen; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Ito.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 725) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Deferred one day Friday, 03-01-13.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1; placed on the calendar for Third Reading with Representative(s) Cheape, Fale, Johanson, Ward voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Coffman, Hanohano, Morikawa, Nakashima, Takumi excused (5).

Passed Third Reading with Representative(s) Cheape, Fale, Fukumoto, Har, Ichiyama, Kawakami, Oshiro, Say, Tokioka, Tsuji, Ward voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Coffman voting no (1) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 200).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to JDL, WAM.
The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-19-13 10:05AM in conference room 16.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Gabbard, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Shimabukuro.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1012) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-25-13 9:20AM in conference room 211.
The committee(s) on WAM deferred the measure until 03-27-13 9:00AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, Espero, Kahele, Keith-Agaran, Ruderman, L. Thielen, Tokuda; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) English, Kouchi.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1362) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 04-09-13.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 484) in amended form (SD 2).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 650).
Re-referred to JUD, FIN, referral sheet 53
House conferees appointed: Rhoads, Ing Co-Chairs; Belatti, C. Lee, Thielen.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 697).
Senate Conferees appointed: Hee, Chair; Ige, Co-Chair(s); Gabbard, Ihara, Kouchi.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 695).
Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Thursday, 04-18-13 4:00PM in conference room 325.
Senator(s) Ige discharged as (Co-) Chair; Added as conferee.
Senator(s) Kouchi discharged as conferee(s); Added as Co-Chair(s).
Received notice of change in Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 709).
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Monday 04-22-13 1:00PM in conference room 325.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Thursday 04-25-13 1:00PM in conference room 325.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Thursday, 04-25-13 at 5:00 PM in Conference Room 325.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Friday 04-26-13 1:00PM in conference room 325.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Friday, 04-26-13 at 5:00PM in Conference Room 325.
